scripts.style: dotnet format style Vertical.Slice.Template.sln --verify-no-changes --severity error --verbosity diagnostic
scripts.analyzers: dotnet format analyzers Vertical.Slice.Template.sln --verify-no-changes --severity error --verbosity diagnostic
scripts.fix-style: dotnet format style Vertical.Slice.Template.sln --severity error --verbosity diagnostic  && git add -A .
scripts.fix-warn-style: dotnet format style Vertical.Slice.Template.sln --severity warn --verbosity diagnostic
scripts.fix-info-style: dotnet format style Vertical.Slice.Template.sln --severity info --verbosity diagnostic
scripts.fix-analyzers: dotnet format analyzers Vertical.Slice.Template.sln --severity error --verbosity diagnostic  && git add -A .
scripts.fix-warn-analyzers: dotnet format analyzers Vertical.Slice.Template.sln --severity warn --verbosity diagnostic
scripts.fix-info-analyzers: dotnet format analyzers Vertical.Slice.Template.sln --severity info --verbosity diagnostic
